Advanced_Expiration_Rules.description: Contains an advanced expiration rule that will apply a custom expiration date/duration to specific learning enrollment

Content_Type.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.

Current_Expiration_Date.description: The recurrence frequency start date. This is the initial expiration date that the recurring expiry will be based on. Example: You specify a Recurrence Start Date of 2021-01-01. This is the initial expiration date and the recurrence cycle will start from this date.

Exclude_from_Search_and_Browse.description: If true, hide learning content from search results.

Expiration_Date.description: The date the content expires. That is, the date a learner is certified until after successfully completing the content.

File_Name.description: Text attribute that identifies the filename of the attachment.

Format_Reference_Learning_Time_Unit_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Format_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Image_ID.description: Text attribute identifying a unique ID for Attachment.

Language_Reference.description: References the languages for the content.

Total_Program_Duration.description: Numeric time duration for the time value reference for the program.

Value.description: The duration unit value. A three digit numeric value.
